thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-DIA And Caixabank Sign Strategic Agreement For Consumer Financing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-DIA And Caixabank Sign Strategic Agreement For Consumer Financing

organizations.name: reuters) - distribuidora internacional de alimentacion sa

text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Distribuidora Internacional de Alimentacion SA (DIA SA):
* SAID ON TUESDAY IT HAS SIGNED A STRATEGIC AGREEMENT WITH CAIXABANK FOR CONSUMER FINANCING
* CAIXABANK CONSUMER FINANCE TO BUY 50 PERCENT OF FINANDIA EFC
* UNDER THE DEAL COMPANIES WILL LAUNCH A UNIVERSAL PAYMENT CARD
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
